name: Path of the Fallen
description:
A lost treasure chest hides deep in the lands of a nearby ruined castle. Many adventurers have attempted to retrieve it, but have failed. Bring the treasure back for glory!

All sound effects and soundtracks come from the WOWIE asset pack: https://jonas-tyroller.itch.io/wowie-pack

All other art is made by me. Created within 3 days for the 2021 WOWIE! game jam.

If you're on Windows, you probably want the PathOfTheFallen-win32-x64.zip download. Have fun!
